articles.title: All-rounder Moeen rules out England Test return
articles.description: All-rounder Moeen Ali rules out a Test comeback for England's tour of Pakistan in December, saying he is "done" with Test cricket.
articles.content:
England won their recent T20 series in Pakistan 4-3 under Moeen's leadership

articles.title: 'It would be an unbelievable honour': Alyssa Healy puts her hand up for Australian captaincy
articles.description: With Meg Lanning's sabbatical, women's cricket in Australia needs a new leader and Alyssa Healy has put her hand up to take the role should the armband pass to her.
articles.content:
The Australian women's cricket team's wicketkeeper and opening batter Alyssa Healy has said she'd be honoured to captain the side.
